name: winsomely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is attractive and pleasing, with simple qualities : She plays the winsomely beautiful daughter of a businessman. He smiled winsomely, but Tessa stared coldly back. See
winsome
More examplesFewer examplesShe fluttered her long eyelashes and looked at him winsomely.He was a long-haired, winsomely pretty young man, who resembled the leader of a boy band.A brood of ducklings waddle winsomely around the grounds.
